page.title: 14TOURIST AMENITIES
page.content: ON OUR GRID THERE ARE MANY TOURIST AMENITIES INCLUDING; 7 CAR PARKS,3 PITCH AND PUTT,7 PUTTING GREENS,7 BOWLING GREENS,36 TENNIS COURTS,13 ARCADES AND ALSO THERE ARE AT LEAST 25 PUBLIC HOUSES.IN THE FOUR NORTHERLY GRID SQUARES THERE ARE; CHILDRENS PLAY AREAS,PUNCH AND JUDY,DONKEY RIDES,CHILDRENS ROUNDABOUTS AND ALSO 7 TRAMPOLINES.FRUIT AND BEACH GOODS,SHELL SOUVENIRS,AND ALSO AMUSEMENTS.WESTBROOK HAS AMENITIES LIKE THE LEISURETIME CENTRE,WIND SURFING AND CANOEING.ALL ALONG THIS COAST LINE THERE ARE SAFETY REGULATIONS FOR HOLIDAY MAKERS,FOR EXAMPLE IN ST. MILDREDS BAY THERE IS A BEACH GUARD,A FIRST AID KIT AND A TORPEDO BOUY.
